titleStmt.title: Contemplations, the sixth volume. By Ios. Hall D. of D.
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 6
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] H[aviland] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Books 16-17 on the Old Testament; includes book 3 on the New Testament.
The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holy storie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
